description: Code review is the single best practice you can introduce in your project that will tremendously improve both the quality of code and the competency of your team. But there are easier and harder ways of doing code review. The author will attempt to convince you that while sending the patches for review by e-mail or attaching them to issue reports on the bug tracker may somehow work, you will get much better results using dedicated software, even when the available options are not that great.
title: Why do you need a code review system?
